sections.title: SDS-PAGE grundlæggende
sections.content:
# SDS-PAGE Analysis

## Princip og mekanisme
SDS-PAGE (Sodium Dodecyl Sulfate Polyacrylamide Gel Electrophoresis) er den mest brugte analytiske metode i protein purification.

### SDS funktion
- **Denaturering**: Bryder non-covalente interaktioner
- **Coating**: Negative SDS molekyler coater protein
- **Uniform ladning**: Charge-to-mass ratio bliver konstant
- **Reduction**: DTT eller β-mercaptoethanol bryder disulfid bonds

### Gel system
- **Stacking gel**: 4-5% acrylamide, pH 6.8
- **Resolving gel**: 8-15% acrylamide, pH 8.8
- **Gradient gels**: Bedre separation over bred range

## Praktisk udførelse

### Gel casting
1. **Resolving gel**: Cast først, overlay med butanol
2. **Stacking gel**: Cast efter polymerization
3. **Comb insertion**: For sample wells
4. **Aging**: 30+ min for komplet polymerization

### Sample preparation
- **Sample buffer**: Tris-HCl, SDS, glycerol, tracking dye
- **Reducing agent**: DTT eller β-mercaptoethanol
- **Heating**: 95°C for 5 min for komplet denaturering
- **Loading volume**: 10-20 μl per well

### Running conditions
- **Voltage**: Start 80V (stacking), 120V (resolving)
- **Current limit**: 30-40 mA per gel
- **Running time**: 1-2 timer
- **Temperature**: Køl til 4°C for bedste resultater

## Molecular weight determination

### Standard curve
- **Protein markers**: Kendte molecular weights
- **Log MW vs. Rf plot**: Lineær relationship
- **Rf calculation**: Migration distance/total gel length
- **Accuracy**: ±10% under optimale conditions

sections.title: Native PAGE og andre teknikker
sections.content:
# Native PAGE Techniques

## Native PAGE
- **Princip**: Separation uden denaturering
- **Bevarer**: Protein komplekser og aktivitet
- **Challenges**: Variable charge-to-mass ratios
- **Applications**: Protein-protein interactions

## Blue Native PAGE
- **Coomassie addition**: Giver negative ladning
- **Mild conditions**: Bevarer komplekser
- **Applications**: Membrane protein komplekser

## Isoelectric Focusing (IEF)
- **pH gradient**: Proteiner migrerer til deres pI
- **Høj resolution**: Kan separere proteins med pI forskelle på 0.01
- **2D-PAGE**: IEF efterfulgt af SDS-PAGE

## Western Blotting
- **Transfer**: Proteiner fra gel til membran
- **Detection**: Specifik antistof binding
- **Applications**: Protein identifikation og quantification

sections.title: Resultat tolkning
sections.content:
# Gel Result Interpretation

## Purity assessment
- **Target band**: Intensitet og scharphed
- **Contaminant bands**: Antal og intensitet
- **Purity estimation**: Target/(Target+Contaminants) × 100%

## Common observations
- **Multiple bands**: Degradation, isoforms, eller contaminants
- **Smearing**: Overloading eller degradation
- **No bands**: Loading problem eller migration issues

## Troubleshooting
- **Poor resolution**: Optimere gel concentration
- **Band distortion**: Check sample preparation
- **Background**: Optimere staining procedure

sections.title: Protein quantification
sections.content:
# Protein Quantification

## Bradford Assay
- **Princip**: Coomassie binding til basicaminosyrer
- **Advantages**: Hurtig, simpel
- **Limitations**: Protein composition afhængig

## BCA Assay
- **Princip**: Copper reduction af protein
- **Advantages**: Mindre composition afhængig
- **Compatible**: Med mange buffers

## UV280 Absorption
- **Princip**: Aromatiske aminosyrer absorberer ved 280 nm
- **Advantages**: Non-destructive, hurtig
- **Requirements**: Kendt extinction coefficient
